challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: Your .three CSS rule should have a background-color property set to rgb(255, 0, 255).

description: To create the final secondary color, magenta, update the rgb function in the .three CSS rule to combine pure blue and pure red.
